objectives: Students will discuss work and career using Expert/Academic register language
Students will engage with Thriller/Suspense themed scenarios related to work and career
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of expert level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining work and career content with Thriller/Suspense narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore work and career through a Thriller/Suspense lens using Expert/Academic language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a dangerous or threatening situation involving work and career

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice expert register vocabulary related to work and career in a thriller context
Students engage in thriller themed role-play about work and career using expert register
Students create original thriller themed content about work and career in expert register

discussion_questions: How would you describe work and career in a Thriller/Suspense scenario?
What suspense or threat might be involved in work and career?
Can you create a Thriller/Suspense story about work and career?
How does work and career change when viewed through a Thriller/Suspense perspective?
What expert register expressions would you use to discuss this thriller scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Thriller/Suspense situation involving work and career
roles: Character A: Using expert register in thriller context
Character B: Responding in expert register within thriller theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Expert/Academic throughout: Scholarly, technical, high-level discourse
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Thriller/Suspense theme: Tension, danger, psychological intensity

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Expert/Academic register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Thriller/Suspense themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of expert register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
